channel.title: Making kill all function but doesnt kill you
channel.description:
i am doing a project for 317 and i was thinking that t his would be done by maby doing [code]if(command.startsWith("killall")&& playerRights == 3){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client [/code] or somthing like that i just cant figure out how to kill them would i use [code] playerLevel[3] = 99; setSkillLevel(3, 0, playerLevel[3]);[/code]
this is a hard task for 317 i did on 508 but 317 is harder to script on lol even tho im better with them so think you guys can give me any help?

item.title: Making kill all function but doesnt kill you
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

that kills 1 person

[code] if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights == 3) {
String nam = command.substring(4);
client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];

        victim.ApplyDead();
        victim.sendMessage("You have been killed by a command by " + playerName + "!");
        setAnimation(829);
    }[/code]

credtis-me

Read full topic
item.source: Making kill all function but doesnt kill you

i am doing a project for 317 and i was thinking that t his would be done by maby doing

if(command.startsWith("killall")&& playerRights == 3){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client
or somthing like that i just cant figure out how to kill them would i use

playerLevel[3] = 99; setSkillLevel(3, 0, playerLevel[3]);

this is a hard task for 317 i did on 508 but 317 is harder to script on lol even tho im better with them so think you guys can give me any help?
